author: snoopdave
msg: Removing uploads.dir and setting uploads.migrate.auto=false in roller.properties, so that 4.0 to 5.0 file migration will not happen unless explicitly enabled by user

author: rhuijben
msg: Fix a pool lifetime issue that only showed up on libsvn_ra_svn.
(svn_wc__open_writable_base): Open file in editor pool to keep checksum
and filename valid until we install it in the pristine store.
(blank_ieb): Use the right default value for a repos_id.

author: rhuijben
msg: Following up on r1100769 implement the stub api via the current BASE + file
external skel storage layer and use this to make the file externals install
Removing the skel handling from the update editor (which is not used for
file externals any more) allows removing these temp apis.
(edit_baton): Store the new style variables in the edit baton.
(close_file): Remove/update obsolete comments and remove file external skel

author: mikedd
msg: OPENJPA-1992: Throw exception if a JPQL query is missing the first positional parameter

author: covener
msg: PR51163: Resolve crashes when LDAP is used for authorization-only
